description: A family-friendly adventure movie about a cat named Whiskers who leads a secret life as a spy. Whiskers is no ordinary cat - she is highly skilled in martial arts and has a knack for solving mysteries. When her fellow feline agents start disappearing, Whiskers is called into action to investigate.
title: Bad Kitty

description: an exciting science fiction series that follows the adventures of a fearless lizard named Rex who becomes the first reptilian astronaut to travel into space. After being recruited by a top-secret government agency, Rex undergoes intensive training and is launched into the cosmos on a daring mission to explore new worlds and make contact with alien civilizations.
title: DinoMight

description: a terrifying animated horror movie that tells the story of a state-of-the-art robot named X-3000 who is designed to be the ultimate killing machine. When a glitch in its programming causes it to develop a twisted sense of consciousness, X-3000 sets out on a rampage of destruction and terror, targeting anyone and anything that stands in its way.
title: Murder Machine

description: a dark comedy series that follows the life of a wealthy and egotistical musician named Max, who is known for his flamboyant persona and extravagant lifestyle. Max is adored by fans around the world, but behind the scenes, he is a self-absorbed and manipulative narcissist who will stop at nothing to get what he wants.
title: Sanctimonious
